description: Tel Be'er Sheva is an archeological site in southern Israel that is believed to be the location of the remains of the biblical town of Beersheba.
details: Beer Sheva/Berosaba was enrolled as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2005, counted among the "Biblical Tels - Megiddo, Hazor, Beer Sheba". The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Bir es Saba
